timeline.message: Added functions to handle copy to nw files

Moved the regex pattern into the function as expect this to not be the used
very often so saving on space. Can move this back to a static if this is 
deemed to be a better choice.
Fixing some logic errors and adding some unit tests

timeline.bodyText:
Since the constructor is private, I would move the instantiation of this constant to the declaration in line 54.
To the constructor, I would then add throw new IllegalStateException("Utility class")

timeline.bodyText: Based on what I could see from the usage, I think it would be better to make relevant functions and variables being called static rather than creating a static instance of the class within itself (doing a bit of testing, it seems to work the same).
